doc:
Mildred Harris https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mildred_Harris 0 Mildred Harris (November 29, 1901 – July 20, 1944) was an American film actress during the early part of the 20th century. She was also the first wife of Charlie Chaplin. Harris began her career in the film industry as a child actress when she was 11 years old. Mildred_Harris ( November_29_,_1901 – July_20_,_1944 ) was an_American_film_actress during the_early_part of the_20th_century . She was also the_first_wife of Charlie_Chaplin . Harris began her_career in the_film_industry as a_child_actress when she was 11_years old .
